tasks.title: Integrate Schema Validator (AJV)
tasks.description: Replace HTML5 validation with AJV to support complex validation logic, 'format' keywords, and better error reporting.

tasks.title: Abstract Renderer Interface
tasks.description: Refactor render functions to return a generic type (T) instead of strings, enabling support for other frameworks like React or Vue.

tasks.title: Implement 'format' Support
tasks.description: Add specific widgets for JSON Schema formats like 'date-time', 'email', 'uri', etc.

tasks.title: Enhance oneOf/Polymorphism UX
tasks.description: Improve the UI for switching between types in oneOf/anyOf, preserving data where possible.
